FuncDef: The reset arp-safeguard statistics command clears ARP bidirectional isolation statistics on an interface board.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot ID of an interface board that is in position.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
This command resets the statistics on ARP request packets, response packets, packets sent to the CPU, and discarded packets of a specified interface.
Before running this command, you can run the display arp-safeguard statistics command to display the statistics on the ARP request packets, response packets, packets sent to the CPU, and discarded packets, helping users to know the traffic status on an interface board.
Prerequisites
Run the arp-safeguard enable command to enable ARP bidirectional isolation.
